mapper.insert: INSERT INTO Project(userNo, title, meetingDate, totalExpense) VALUES(#{userNo}, #{title}, #{meetingDate}, #{totalExpense})
INSERT INTO ProjectDetail(projectNo, ownerNo, routeNo) VALUES(#{projectNo}, #{ownerNo}, #{routeNo})
mapper.update: update Project p set p.read = p.read + 1 where projectNo = #{projectNo}
mapper.select: select p.projectNo, u.nickname, p.title, p.regDate, p.meetingDate, p.read, p.buddies, u.userNo, sum(pj.payment) as totalExpense from Project p, Users u, ProjectDetail pj where p.userNo=u.userNo and p.projectNo = #{projectNo} and pj.projectNo = p.projectNo
mapper.update: update Project set title=#{title}, meetingDate=#{meetingDate}, buddies=#{buddies} where projectNo = #{projectNo}
update Project set projectStatus=72 where projectNo = #{projectNo}
mapper.delete: delete from ProjectLike where projectNo = #{projectNo} and userNo = #{userNo}
mapper.select: select * from ProjectLike where projectNo = #{projectNo} and userNo = #{userNo}
